  • @ACheck(name="Unwanted method calls",
        description="Some methods like System.exit or System.gc might be unwanted, because they might introduce unwanted side effect or reduce performance.",
        groupName="Bad practice",
        defaultEnablement=YELLOW,
        languages=JAVA,
        parameters=ABSTRACT_SYNTAX_TREE)

extends EntityTokenCheckBase
